paragraphs.original: 已到了腊月二十九日了，各色齐备，两府中都换了门神、联对、挂牌，新油了桃符，焕然一新。宁国府从大门、仪门、大厅、暖阁、内厅、内三门、内仪门并内垂门，直到正堂，一路正门大开。两边阶下一色朱红大高烛，点的两条金龙一般。次日，由贾母有封诰者，皆按品级著朝服，先坐八人大轿，带领众人进宫朝贺行礼。领宴毕回来，便到宁府暖阁下轿。诸子弟有未随入朝者，皆在宁府门前排班伺候，然后引人宗祠。
paragraphs.english: It is the twenty-ninth day of the last lunar month. All the necessary items have been prepared. The gates and gates of the two courts, the hall, the warm pavilion, the inner hall, the inner hall, the inner three gates, the inner gate of rites, and the main hall are all open. On both sides of the steps, there are two golden red big candles, like two golden dragons. The next day, the old lady Jia and those with honorary titles wore their court robes and rode in eight large carriages, leading the crowd to the palace to pay homage and pay their respects. After receiving the banquet, they arrived at the warm pavilion of the Ning Court to dismount the carriage. Those who did not go with them stood in front of the Ning Court gate and waited in line, and then led them to the ancestral temple.
paragraphs.chinese: 已经到了腊月二十九，各种物品都准备好了。两府的大门、仪门、大厅、暖阁、内厅、内三门、内仪门和内垂门，直到正堂，一路大门都打开了。两边台阶上点着两根金红色的大蜡烛，像两条金色的龙一样。第二天，贾母和有封诰的人，都穿上了朝服，坐上八人大轿，带领众人进宫朝贺行礼。领完宴回来，就到了宁府的暖阁下轿。那些没有随同入朝的人，都站在宁府门前排班等候，然后引人宗祠。

paragraphs.original: 且说宝琴是初次进贾祠观看，一面细细留神，打量这宗祠。原来宁府西边另一个院子，黑油栅栏内五间大门，上面悬一匾，写著是“贾氏宗祠”四个字，旁书“特晋爵太傅前翰林掌院事王希献书”。两边有一副长联，写道：“肝脑涂地，兆姓赖保育之恩；功名贯天，百代仰蒸尝之盛。”也是王太傅所书。进入院中，白石甬路，两边皆是苍松翠柏，月台上设著古铜鼎彝等器。抱厦前面悬一块九龙金匾，写道“星辉辅弼。”乃先皇御笔。两边一副对联，写道是：“勋业有光昭日月；功名无间及儿孙。”也是御笔。五间正殿前悬一块闹龙填青匾，写道是“慎终追远。”旁边一副对联，写道是：“以后儿孙承福德，至今黎庶念宁荣。”俱是御笔。
paragraphs.english: Bao Qian was visiting the Jia Temple for the first time and carefully observed the temple. Originally, there was a black oil grille in a courtyard on the west side of the Ning mansion, which had five doors with a plaque hanging on it, reading "Jia Family Temple". It was followed by "Zheijun Wang Xiexian's book", which was written by Wang Taifu. On both sides of the gate was a long couplet, reading: "Die your brains and blood, and the people rely on the protection of the emperor; the name is etched in the sky, and the descendants of the hundred generations admire the glory of the temple." It was also written by Wang Taifu. After entering the courtyard, there was a white stone path, with cypresses and cedars on both sides. There were ancient copper tripod and other utensils on the moon platform. In front of the pavilion, there was a gold-embossed dragon plaque, reading "Starlight and辅弼". It was the hand of the late emperor. On both sides was a couplet, reading: "Era has light and glory, and the people of the hundred generations admire the glory of the temple." It was also the hand of
paragraphs.chinese: 宝琴是第一次参观贾祠，仔细观察这座祠堂。原来宁府西边的一个院子里，有一道黑油栅栏，里面有五间大门，门上挂着一块匾，写着“贾氏宗祠”四个字，旁边写着“特晋爵太傅前翰林掌院事王希献书”。两边有一副长联，写着：“肝脑涂地，兆姓赖保育之恩；功名贯天，百代仰蒸尝之盛。”也是王太傅所写的。进入院中，有条白石甬路，两边都是苍松翠柏，月台上摆放着古铜鼎彝等器物。抱厦前面挂着一块九龙金匾，写着“星辉辅弼”。这是先皇御笔。两边有一副对联，写着：“勋业有光昭日月；功名无间及儿孙。”也是御笔。五间正殿前悬着一块闹龙填青匾，写着“慎终追远。”旁边有一副对联，写着：“以后儿孙承福德，至今黎庶念宁荣。”这些都是御笔。

paragraphs.original: 里边灯烛辉煌，锦幛绣幕，虽列著些神主，却看不真。只见贾府诸人分了昭穆，排班立定。贾敬主祭，贾赦陪祭，贾珍献爵，贾琏贾琮献帛，宝玉捧香，贾菖贾菱展拜垫，守焚池。青衣乐奏，三献爵，兴拜毕，焚帛奠酒。礼毕，乐止，退出。众人围随贾母至正堂上影前，锦帐高挂，彩屏张护，香烛辉煌，上面正房中，悬著荣宁二祖遗像，皆是披蟒腰玉；两边还有几轴列祖遗像。贾荇贾芷等，从内仪门挨次站列，直到正堂廊下；槛外方是贾敬贾赦；槛内是各女眷；众家人小厮皆在仪门之外。每一道菜至，传至仪门，贾荇贾芷等便接了，按次传至阶下贾敬手中。贾蓉系长房长孙，独他随女眷在槛里。每贾敬捧菜至，传于贾蓉；贾蓉便传于他媳妇，又传于凤姐尤氏诸人；直传至供桌前，方传与王夫人；王夫人传与贾母，贾母方捧放在桌上。邢夫人在供桌之西，东向立，同贾母供放。直至将菜饭汤点酒茶传完，贾蓉方退出去，归入贾芹阶位之首。当时凡从“文”旁之名者，贾敬为首；下则从“玉”者，贾珍为首；再下从“草头”者，贾蓉为首。左昭右穆，男东女西。俟贾母拈香下拜，众人方一齐跪下，将五间大厅，三间抱厦，内外廊檐，阶上阶下，两丹墀内，花团锦簇，塞的无一些空地。鸦雀无闻，只听铿锵叮当，金铃玉佩微微摇曳之声，并起跪靴履飒沓之响。
paragraphs.english: The hall was brightly lit, with silken curtains, and there were some ancestral tablets, but it was difficult to make them out. The Jia family members were arranged according to their age. Jia Jing presided over the worship, Jia Sheng accompanied him, Jia Zhen poured the wine, Jia Cheng and Jia Cong offered the silk and cloth, and Yu held the incense. Jia Chang and Jia Ling arranged the mats, and stood by the incense pool. The musicians in green robes played music, and three times they poured the wine, and then the worship was over, and the music stopped, and they withdrew. The crowd surrounded Jia Mu and went to the main hall. The curtains were high, the screens were colorful, and the candles and incense were brilliant. On the main hall, there were portraits of the two ancestors of the Jia and Ning families, all of whom were wearing robes and wearing jade on their waists; there were also several scrolls of ancestral portraits on both sides. Jia Xing and Jia Zhi were lined up in the inner gate; the fence was Jia Jing and Jia Sheng; the women in the family were lined up inside the fence; the servants andJia Rong then left the room and returned to his position next to Jia Qin. All those who had a character with the word Wen, Jia Jing was the first; those with the character Yu, Jia Zhen was the first; and those with the character Cao, Jia Rong was the first. The men stood on the left, and the women on the right. When the elderly lady began to burn incense and prostrate herself, all of the people prostrated themselves. There were five rooms with three in the rear and the two courtyards in front were filled with people, flowers, and ribbons. There was not a single empty space. There was not a single sound but the sound of the jingling of the bells and the clanging of the metal pendants on the ladies' robes, and the rustling of the men's boots as they rose and knelt.
paragraphs.chinese: 这里灯火辉煌，锦缎绣幕，虽然排列着一些神主，但看不清楚。只见贾府诸人按照长幼顺序排成一排。贾敬主持祭祀，贾赦陪同祭祀，贾珍献酒，贾琏贾琮献布帛，宝玉持香，贾菖贾菱布置拜垫，守在焚香池边。青衣乐师奏乐，三次献酒，兴拜完毕，焚香奠酒。仪式完毕，乐声停止，退出。众人围随贾母到正堂上，锦帐高挂，彩屏张护，香烛辉煌，上面正房中，悬挂着荣宁二祖遗像，都是披蟒腰玉；两边还有几轴列祖遗像。贾荇、贾芷等，从内仪门依次站在廊下；栏外是贾敬、贾赦；栏内是各女眷；众家人小厮都在仪门之外。每一道菜到，传到仪门，贾荇、贾芷等便接了，依次传给贾敬。贾蓉是长房长孙，他跟女眷在栏内。每道菜由贾敬捧着，传给贾蓉；贾邢夫人站在供桌的西边，面向东，同贾母一起供奉。一直到将菜肴、饭菜、汤、点心、酒和茶传完，贾蓉才退出来，回到贾芹的位置上。当时，所有从“文”旁的字来命名的人，贾敬排第一；其次是“玉”旁的字，贾珍排第一；再次是“草头”旁的字，贾蓉排第一。男的站在左边，女的站在右边。等到贾母开始拈香下拜，众人才一起跪下。五间大厅、三间抱厦、内外廊檐、台阶上台阶下、两个丹墀内，花团锦簇，塞得没有一点空地。鸦雀无声，只听铿锵叮当，金铃玉佩微微摇曳的声音，以及起跪靴履飒沓的声音。

paragraphs.original: 一时礼毕，贾敬贾赦等便忙退出至荣府，专候与贾母行礼。尤氏上房，地下铺满红毡，当地放著象鼻三足泥鳅流金珐琅大火盆。正面炕上铺著新猩红毡子，设著大红彩绣云龙捧寿的靠背引枕；坐褥外，另有黑狐皮的袱子，搭在上面；大白狐皮坐褥。请贾母上去坐了。两边又铺皮褥，请贾母一辈的两三位妯娌坐了。这边横头排插之后，小炕上也铺了皮褥，让邢夫人等坐下。地下两面相对十二张雕漆椅上，都是一色灰鼠椅搭小褥，每一张椅下一个大铜脚炉，让宝琴等姐妹坐。尤氏用茶盘亲捧茶与贾母，贾蓉媳妇捧与众老祖母，然后尤氏又捧与邢夫人等，贾蓉媳妇又捧与众姐妹。凤姐李纨等只在地下伺候。
paragraphs.english: When the ceremony was over, Jia Jing and Jia Pai hurried back to the Red Mansion to pay respect to his mother. In You's study, the floor was covered with red carpet, and in the middle was an elephant-nosed tripod of bronze and gold lacquered red fire dragon. On the front bed was new red silk, with a new red embroidered cloud dragon and phoenix supporting the longevity peach on the backrest and pillow; on the outside, there was a black fox fur cover, which was draped on top; there was also a white fox fur seat. Please the old lady to sit down. On both sides, there were twelve carved lacquer chairs, each with a gray mouse chair cover and a small seat cushion, and each with a large copper foot warmer under it, with the young ladies sitting on them. You held the tea tray in her own hands to serve tea to the old lady, and Jia Rong's wife held it for the old ladies. Then You held it for Jia Rong's wife and then Jia Rong's wife held it for the young ladies. Only Fengzheng and Liwan were standing on the ground to attend to it.
paragraphs.chinese: 一礼毕，贾敬贾赦等人便匆忙退至荣府，准备与贾母行礼。尤氏上房，地下铺满红毡，当地放着象鼻三足泥鳅流金珐琅大火盆。正面炕上铺着新猩红毡子，设有大红彩绣云龙捧寿的靠背引枕；坐褥外，另有黑狐皮的袱子，搭在上面；大白狐皮坐褥。请贾母上去坐了。两边又铺皮褥，请贾母一辈的两三位妯娌坐了。这边横头排插之后，小炕上也铺了皮褥，让邢夫人等坐下。地下两面相对十二张雕漆椅上，都是一色灰鼠椅搭小褥，每一张椅下一个大铜脚炉，让宝琴等姐妹坐。尤氏用茶盘亲自捧茶给贾母，贾蓉媳妇捧给众老祖母，然后尤氏又捧给邢夫人等，贾蓉媳妇又捧给众姐妹。凤姐李纨等只在地下伺候。

paragraphs.original: 茶毕，邢夫人等便先起身来侍贾母吃茶。贾母与年老妯娌们闲话了两三句，便命看轿。凤姐儿忙上去搀起来。尤氏笑回说：“已经预备下老太太的晚饭。每年都不肯赏些体面，用过晚饭再过去，果然我们就不济凤丫头了？”凤姐儿搀著贾母笑道：“老祖宗走罢。偺们家去吃去，别理他。”贾母笑道：“你这里供著祖宗，忙得什么儿似的，那里还搁的住我闹？况且我每年不吃，你们也要送去的；不如还送了来，我吃不了，留著明儿再吃，岂不多吃些？”说的众人都笑了。又吩咐他：“好生派妥当人夜里坐著看香火，不是大意得的。”尤氏答应了。一面走出来，至暖阁前，尤氏等闪过屏风，小厮门才领轿夫，请了轿出大门。尤氏亦随邢夫人等回至荣府。
paragraphs.english: After drinking the tea, Xing Fu and others rose to attend to Old Lady Jia. Jia Old Lady and the old sisters chatted for a while, and then ordered the sedan chair. The wife of Yu (a female relative of the Jia family) laughed and said, "Every year, you do not prepare a decent dinner for Old Lady Jia, and you will go after dinner, so we are not as good as the wife of Feng (a relative of the Jia family)." Feng Fu helped Old Lady Jia and said with a smile, "Old Lady Jia, let's go home and eat. Don't bother with them." Old Lady Jia laughed and said, "You have so many ancestors to worship, and you are so busy that you can't take care of me. Besides, I don't eat much every year, and you also send me some. It's better to keep it for tomorrow and eat more." Everyone laughed. Jia Old Lady also instructed them, "Be sure to send some good people to sit and watch the candles at night." Yu Old Lady agreed. Then they walked out to the warm pavilion, and Yu Old Lady and others hid behind the screen. The young men led the sedan chair bear
paragraphs.chinese: 喝完茶，邢夫人等人就先起身来侍贾母吃茶。贾母与年老妯娌们闲聊了几句，便命人看轿。凤姐儿忙上去搀起贾母来。尤氏笑着说：“每年都不肯给老太太准备体面的晚饭，用过晚饭再过去，果然我们比不上凤姐儿。”凤姐儿搀着贾母笑道：“老太太走吧。我们家去吃去，别理他们。”贾母笑道：“你这里供着祖宗，忙得什么似的，哪里还容得我闹？况且我每年不吃，你们也要送的；不如还送过来，我吃不了，留着明天再吃，岂不多吃些？”说着，大家都笑了。又吩咐他们：“好生派妥当人夜里坐着看香火，不是大意得的。”尤氏答应了。一面走出来，到暖阁前，尤氏等人闪到屏风后面，小厮们才领轿夫，请了轿子出大门。尤氏也跟着邢夫人等回到荣府。

paragraphs.original: 这里轿出大门。这一条街上，东一边设立著宁国公的仪仗执事乐器，西一边设立著荣国公的仪仗执事乐器，来往行人皆屏退不从此过。
paragraphs.english:
Walk out of the gate, the east and west of this street are set up the仪仗, the executor and instrument of Ningguo Gong and Rongguo Gong. The passerby can't go through here.

解析：

1. 走出大门：walk out of the gate
2. 这条街的东边和西边：the east and west of this street
3. 分别：respectively
4. 设置：set up
5. 宁国公和荣国公的仪仗、执事和乐器：the仪仗, the executor and instrument of Ningguo Gong and Rongguo Gong
6. 路人：the passerby
7. 不得：can't
8. 从此经过：go through here
paragraphs.chinese: 走出大门，这条街的东边和西边分别设置了宁国公和荣国公的仪仗、执事和乐器。路人不得从此经过。

paragraphs.original: 一时来至荣府，也是大门正门一直开到里头。如今便不在暖阁下轿了，过了大厅，转弯向西，至贾母这边正厅上下轿。众人围随同至贾母正堂中间，亦是锦裀绣屏，焕然一新。当地火盆内焚著松柏香，百合草。贾母归了坐，老嬷嬷来回：“老太太们来行礼。”贾母忙起身要迎，只见两三个老妯娌已进来了。大家挽手，笑了一回，让了一回。吃茶去后，贾母只送至内仪门就回来归了正坐。贾敬贾赦等领了诸子弟进来。贾母笑道：“一年家难为你们，不行礼罢。”一面男一起，女一起，一起一起俱行过了礼，左右设下交椅，然后又按长幼挨次归坐受礼。两府男女、小厮、丫鬟，亦按差役(上、中、下)行礼毕，然后散了押岁钱并荷包金银锞等物。摆上合欢宴来，男东女西归坐，献屠苏酒、合欢汤、吉祥果、如意糕毕。贾母起身进内间更衣，众人方各散出。那晚各处佛堂灶王前焚香上供。王夫人正房院内设著天地纸马香供。大观园正门上挑著角灯，两旁高照，各处皆有路灯。上下人等，打扮的花团锦簇，一夜人声杂沓，语笑喧阗，爆竹起火，络绎不绝。
paragraphs.english: I came to the Rongfu mansion, and the main entrance was opened all the way to the inside. Now, I did not step down from the sedan chair at the warm hall, but passed through the main hall, turned west, and came to the main hall on the east side of the Rongfu mansion, where I stepped down from the sedan chair. Everyone surrounded me and came to the main hall on the east side of the Rongfu mansion, where the floor was covered with silk and embroidered screens, and everything was brand new. The fireplaces in the local fire pits burned with pine and cypress incense and hundred-leaf grass. After the old women came to say, "The old ladies came to pay their respects." The old lady hurried to get up to greet, but only saw several old sisters come in. They all held hands and laughed for a while and let them go. After eating tea, the old lady only sent them to the inner gate and returned to her seat. Then, Jia Jing and Jia Pali led the other young men and women in to pay their respects. The old lady laughed and said, "It's difficult to be away from you for a year, so I won't pay my respects to youOn that night, incense was burned and offerings were made in each Buddhist temple and kitchen. In the main courtyard of Lady Wang's residence, offerings were made to heaven and earth. The main gate of the Grand View Garden was hung with lanterns, and there were lanterns on both sides. Everyone was dressed in beautiful clothes, and there was a continuous stream of people talking and laughing, and firecrackers and fireworks were never-ending.
paragraphs.chinese: 我来到荣府，大门一直开到里面。现在不从暖阁下轿了，过了大厅，转弯向西，来到贾母这边正厅上下轿。众人围随我一同来到贾母正堂中间，到处都是锦裀绣屏，焕然一新。当地火盆内烧着松柏香，百合草。贾母归了坐，老嬷嬷来回：“老太太们来行礼。”贾母忙起身要迎，只见两三个老妯娌已进来了。大家挽手，笑了一回，让了一回。吃茶去后，贾母只送至内仪门就回来归了正坐。贾敬贾赦等领了诸子弟进来。贾母笑道：“一年家难为你们，不行礼罢。”一面男一起，女一起，一起一起俱行过了礼，左右设下交椅，然后又按长幼挨次归坐受礼。两府男女、小厮、丫鬟，亦按差役（上、中、下）行礼毕，然后散了押岁钱并荷包金银锞等物。摆上合欢宴来，男东女西归坐，献屠苏酒、合贾母起身进入内室更衣，众人散去。当晚各处佛堂灶王爷前点燃香火供奉。王夫人的正房院内设着天地纸马香供。大观园正门上悬挂着角灯，两旁高照，各处都有路灯。上下人等，打扮得花团锦簇，一夜人声杂沓，语笑喧阗，爆竹起火，络绎不绝。

paragraphs.original: 至次日五鼓，贾母等人按品上妆，摆全副执事进宫朝贺，兼祝元春千秋。领宴回来，又至宁府祭过列祖，方回来。受礼毕，便换衣歇息。所有贺节来的亲友，一概不会，只和薛姨妈李婶娘二人说话，随便或和宝玉宝钗等姐妹赶围棋摸牌作戏。王夫人和凤姐天天忙著请人吃年酒，那边厅上和院内皆是戏酒，亲友络绎不绝。一连忙了七八天，才完了。早又元宵将近，宁荣二府皆张灯结彩。十一日是贾赦请贾母等，次日贾珍又请贾母，王夫人和凤姐儿也连日被人请去吃年酒，不能胜记。至十五这一晚上，贾母便在大花厅上命摆几席酒，定一班小戏，满挂各色花灯，带领宁荣二府各子侄孙男孙媳等家宴。贾敬素不饮酒茹荤，因此不去请他。十七日祀祖已完，他就出城修养。就是这几天在家，也只静室默处，一概无闻，不在话下。
paragraphs.english: The next day at dawn, the Jia family got up in their court dress and entered the palace to offer their formal greetings to the empress, and to wish her good health. After the banquet, they went to visit the tombs of their ancestors at the Ning and Rong estates before returning home. After receiving their blessings, they changed into their civilian clothes and rested. They did not see any visitors, except for Xue Baochai and Li Xian. On the one hand, Wang Fei and Feng Xiaoyun were busy entertaining guests to the New Year's banquet, while on the other hand, the halls and courtyards of the Ning and Rong estates were filled with performers and guests, with no end in sight. For eight days, they were in a constant state of exhaustion. It was not until the fifteenth day of the first lunar month that they were able to relax. On the seventeenth day, after the ancestral rites were complete, Jia Jing did not attend the banquet.

paragraphs.original: 贾赦领了贾母之赏，告辞而去。贾母知他在此不便，也随他去了。贾赦到家中，和众门客赏灯吃酒，笙歌聒耳，锦绣盈眸，其取乐与这里不同。
paragraphs.english: Jia Pai received the rewards from Jia Mi and bid her farewell. Jia Mi knew it was not convenient for him to stay there, so she let him go. Jia Pai returned home and entertained his guests with lanterns, wine, and music, which was a far cry from the scene here.

paragraphs.original: 这里贾母花厅上摆了十来席酒，每席旁边设一几，几上设炉瓶三事，焚著御赐百合宫香；又有八寸来长、四五寸宽、二三寸高、点缀著山石的小盆景，俱是新鲜花卉；又有小洋漆茶盘放著旧窑十锦小茶杯；又有紫檀雕嵌的大纱透绣花草诗字的缨络。各色旧窑小瓶中，都点缀著岁寒三友、玉堂富贵等鲜花。上面两席是李婶娘薛姨妈坐；东边单设一席，乃是雕夔龙护屏矮足短榻，靠背、引枕、皮褥俱全。榻上设一个轻巧洋漆描金小几，几上放著茶碗、漱盂、洋巾之类，又有一个眼镜匣子。
paragraphs.english: The old lady set up a dozen tables in the flower hall. Each table was placed with a small tea table, where there was a copper lamp with a lamp wick; a small flower pot, planted with fresh flowers; and a small silken lace with the words of flowers and poems carved on it. There were all kinds of old porcelain small bottles, all of which were decorated with the three friends of winter and the riches of the palace. On the top two tables, Li and She sat; on the east side, a single seat was set up, a low foot stool, with a carved dragon screen, with a back, a cushion, and a leather cushion. There was a small lacquer table with a small one on it, with a tea bowl, a water bowl, a linen handkerchief, and a small glass case.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母在花厅上摆了十来席酒，每席旁边放着一个小茶几，上面有炉瓶三件，点燃着御赐的百合宫香；还有八寸长、四五寸宽、二三寸高的小盆景，都是新鲜的花卉；以及紫檀雕嵌的小纱透绣花草诗字的缨络。各色旧窑小瓶中，都点缀着岁寒三友、玉堂富贵等鲜花。上面两席是李婶娘和薛姨妈坐的；东边单设一席，是一张雕夔龙护屏矮足短榻，靠背、引枕、皮褥俱全。榻上放着一个小巧的洋漆描金小几，上面有茶碗、漱盂、洋巾之类，还有一个眼镜匣子。

paragraphs.original: 贾母歪在榻上，和众人说笑一回，又取眼镜向戏台上照一回。又说：“恕我老了骨头疼，容我放肆些，歪著相陪罢。”又命琥珀坐在榻上，拿著美人拳捶腿。榻下并不摆席面，只一张高几，设著高架缨络、花瓶、香炉等物外，另设一小高桌，摆著杯箸。在旁边一席，命宝琴、湘云、黛玉、宝玉四人坐著。每馔果菜来，先捧给贾母看，喜则留在小桌上尝尝，仍撤了放在席上，只算他四人跟著贾母坐。下面方是邢夫人王夫人之位。下边便是尤氏、李纨、凤姐、贾蓉的媳妇；西边便是宝钗、李纹、李绮、岫烟、迎春姐妹等。两边大梁，上挂著联三聚五玻璃彩穗灯。每席前竖著倒垂荷叶一柄，柄上有彩烛插著。这荷叶乃是洋錾珐琅活信，可以扭转向外，将灯影逼住，照著看戏，分外真切。窗格门户一齐摘下，全挂彩穗，各种宫灯。廊檐内外及两边游廊罩棚，将羊角、玻璃、戳纱，料丝，或绣、或画、或绢、或纸，诸灯挂满。廊上几席就是贾珍、贾琏、贾环、贾琮、贾蓉、贾芹、贾芸、贾菖，贾菱等。
paragraphs.english: Grandmother Jia lay on the bed, chatting with everyone for a while, and then took the eyeglasses and looked at the stage. Then she said, "Please forgive me for my old bones aching, let me be a little impertinent and lean back to accompany you." She ordered Amber to sit on the bed and pound her legs with the beautiful fist. There was no table set at the foot of the bed, only a high table, on which there were high bridges, tassels, flower vases, and incense burners. On the side table, Jia Qian, Xiangyun, Lin Daiyu, and Yu were seated. When each dish came, it was first presented to Grandmother Jia to taste. If she liked it, she left it on the small table to taste, and then removed it from the table and placed it on the table, only to count it as Jia Qian, Xiangyun, Lin Daiyu, and Yu following Grandmother Jia to sit. Underneath was the place for Xing Fu and Wang Fu. Underneath were You Shi, Li Lan, Feng Er, and the wife of Jia Rong. On the west side were Baochai, Li WenThe lanterns made of sheep horns, glass, push mesh, crystal, embroidery, painting, silk, and paper were hung on the roof and along the eaves of the corridors on both sides of the corridor. Several tables on the corridor were for Jia Zhen, Jia Lian, Jia Huan, Jia Cong, Jia Rong, Jia Qing, Jia Yun, Jia Chang, and Jia Ling.

paragraphs.original: 贾母也曾差人去请众族中男女，奈他们有年老的，懒于热闹。有家内没有人，又有疾病淹留，要来竟不能来；有一等妒富愧贫，不肯来的；更有憎畏凤姐之为人，赌气不来的；更有羞手羞脚，不惯见人，不敢来的：因此，族中虽多，女眷来者不过贾蓝之母娄氏带了贾蓝来。男人只有贾芹、贾芸、贾菖、贾菱四个－－现在凤姐麾下办事的－－来了。当下人虽不全，在家庭小宴，也算热闹的。
paragraphs.english: Grandmother Jia once sent people to invite the relatives of the family, but some of the elderly were lazy and reluctant to be noisy; some were busy with their families, and some were delayed by illness; some were envious of the rich and ashamed of the poor and unwilling to come; some were angry with the character of Fengzheng and came to have a temper; some were ashamed to see people and dared not come: so although there were many in the family, the ladies who came were only Jialong's mother Liuqin, who came with Jialong. There were only four men, Jiaqing, Jiayun, Jiachang and Jialing, who are now under the command of Fengzheng. At present, although the people were not complete, it was considered to be a lively family banquet.
